testcase.name: Change currency to Euro
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to programs page...........................................passed And User select tuition fees filter.........................................passed And User clicks on Change Currency..........................................passed And User selects EUR from currency list.....................................passed When User save changes......................................................passed Then currency is changed to Euro in the programs listing....................passed And currency is changed to Euro in program details screen...................passed

testcase.name: Favorite a program from programs page
testcase.system-out: Given User logged in successfully...........................................passed And User opens programs page................................................passed And User clicks more details................................................passed When User clicks on favorite icon...........................................passed And User opens Dashboard....................................................passed And User opens favorites section............................................passed Then The selected programs appear on favorites..............................passed
